channel.title: Proactively Monitoring the Network Fabric on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Proactively Monitoring the Network Fabric on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: MLAG Troubleshooting with NetQ
item.description: This chapter outlines a few scenarios that illustrate how you use NetQ to troubleshoot MLAG on Cumulus Linux switches. Each starts with a log message that indicates the current of MLAG state. NetQ can monitor many aspects of an MLAG configuration, including: Verifying the current state of all nodes Verifying the dual connectivity state Checking that the peer link is part of the bridge Verifying whether MLAG bonds are not bridge members
